article.title: ZeroMedium
article.text:
[http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroMedium.bit ZeroMedium] is a social network created by [[Krixano]] as a clone/alternative to [https://www.medium.com Medium.com] for ZeroNet. It was first released on October 1st, 2017 An initial version of inline markdown support was released on October 12th, 2017. The November part 1 (aka 17-11A) update added the ability to add Images via [[Optional Files]] support. ZeroMedium was added to [[Git Center]] on November 2nd, 2017.

The bit domain was registered by lingdu.
